title: CNN Cat and Dog Classification
description: This is another well known dataset to do hands on Image Classification  using Convolutional Neural Network (CNN).CNN as a subset of Deep Learning uses Convolution instead of linear matrix operation. Convolution is a mathematical operation between 2 functions f(x) and g(x) expressing how the shape of one is modified by the other as f o g(x).Import the libraries.
description_lemmatized: another well known dataset hand image classification using convolutional neural network cnncnn subset deep learning us convolution instead linear matrix operation convolution mathematical operation 2 function fx gx expressing shape one modified f gximport library
